item.title: Diane Keaton’s $29 million ‘house that Pinterest built’ was taken off market 2 weeks before she died
item.description: Hollywood legend Diane Keaton’s beloved “house that Pinterest built” was quietly taken off the market just 2 weeks before her death at the age of 79.
